func.title: GetPlrView

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player whose view you want to determine.

func.desc: Returns the object which is followed by a player's view. If the player view does not currently follow an object, the function returns nil (also see GetPlrViewMode).
func.remark: If player view has been set using (SetPlrView), the view will follow the selected clonk (unless in view mode "Scroll", see GetPlrViewMode). This can be determined using GetCursor.
In 9.0 OC this function was deprecated, because it can be retrieved from a player directly with GetPlayer and GetViewTarget().
